sqlQuery.name: AllVariables
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct stable_id as variable_id from eda.AttributeGraph where (hidden is null or (hidden != '["everywhere"]' and hidden != '["variableTree"]')) and stable_id in (select stable_id from eda.Attribute)

sqlQuery.name: Name
sqlQuery.sql: select attribute_id as variable_id, listagg(display_name, ' / ') within group (order by display_name) as name, '@PROJECT_ID@' as project, listagg(display_name, ' / ') within group (order by display_name) as hyperlinkName from (select distinct stable_id as attribute_id, display_name from eda.AttributeGraph where (hidden is null or (hidden != '["everywhere"]' and hidden != '["variableTree"]')) and stable_id in (select stable_id from eda.Attribute) ) group by attribute_id

sqlQuery.name: CategoriesPath
sqlQuery.sql: select attribute_id as variable_id, nvl(listagg(path, '; ') within group (order by path), 'n/a') as path from (select distinct attribute_id, path from (select attribute_id, study_id, listagg(ancestor, ' > ') within group (order by lvl desc) as path from (select distinct connect_by_root stable_id as attribute_id, study_id, parent_stable_id as ancestor_attribute_id, ag.display_name ancestor, level as lvl from eda.AttributeGraph ag where (hidden is null or (hidden != '["everywhere"]' and hidden != '["variableTree"]')) and stable_id in (select stable_id from eda.Attribute) start with stable_id in (select stable_id from eda.Attribute) connect by stable_id = prior parent_stable_id and study_id = prior study_id ) group by attribute_id, study_id ) ) group by attribute_id

sqlQuery.name: StudyInfo
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct sd.dataset_id, sd.study_stable_id as study_id, ag.stable_id as variable_id, a.entity_type_stable_id as entity_type_id, nvl(ag.display_name, 'n/a') as attribute_name, nvl(ag.provider_label, 'n/a') as provider_label, nvl(dsp.display_name, 'n/a') as study_name, nvl(etg.display_name, 'n/a') as entity_type, nvl(ag.definition, 'n/a') as attribute_definition from eda.AttributeGraph ag, eda.Attribute a, eda.EntityTypeGraph etg, apidbTuning.StudyIdDatasetId sd, eda.Study s, apidbTuning.DatasetPresenter dsp where ag.stable_id = a.stable_id and a.entity_type_id = etg.entity_type_id and etg.study_stable_id = sd.study_stable_id and ag.study_id = s.study_id and s.stable_id = etg.study_stable_id and sd.dataset_id = dsp.dataset_presenter_id and (ag.hidden is null or (ag.hidden != '["everywhere"]' and ag.hidden != '["variableTree"]'))
